document_data.mainbody:
Destus Gurn was a member of the Baldurs Gate branch of the Iron Throne during the mid-to-late 14 century DR. He served as the assistant Chief Accountant for all operations in the Sword Coast.
During the iron crisis of 1368 DR, Destus was set to intercept Emissary Tar during her visit to the Iron Thrones headquarters in Baldurs Gate.
